name: homepage-thg
description: Rewrite of thg homepage using parcel and bootstrap

scripts.devStart: npm run makeCv && parcel src/index.html --dist-dir dev
scripts.build: rm -rf build && rm -rf .parcel-cache && npm run makeCv && parcel build src/index.html --no-source-maps --public-url / --dist-dir build

author: Thomas Grusz
